response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and I believe it would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value and quality, I propose a price of $10,500 for this product. I understand its worth to you is $12,000, and I hope this offer reflects a fair compromise. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.", "product_price": 10500}
